mapper.sql: id, cn_name, en_name, mini_cn_name, mini_en_name, country_id, level_id, partygroup_id, resume, area1, area2, area3, keyword, deleted, operator, insert_time, update_time
mapper.select: select p.id, p.cn_name, p.en_name, p.mini_cn_name,p.mini_en_name, p.country_id, p.level_id,p.partygroup_id p.resume,p.area1,p.area2,p.area3,p.keyword, h.countryFullName, p.deleted, p.operator, p.insert_time, p.update_time from politics_person as p , hs_country_new as h where p.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and p.deleted = 0 and p.country_id = h.number

select p.id, p.cn_name, p.en_name, p.mini_cn_name,p.mini_en_name, p.country_id, p.level_id,p.partygroup_id,p.resume, p.area1, p.area2, p.area3, p.keyword, p.deleted, p.operator, p.insert_time, p.update_time, h.countryFullName, pp.cn_name as position_name from politics_person as p , hs_country_new as h,politics_position as pp,politics_person_position as ppp
p.deleted = 0 AND p.country_id = h.number AND p.id=ppp.person_id AND pp.id = ppp.position_id
AND p.country_id = #{countryId}
AND p.cn_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{cnName},'%')
AND p.en_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{enName},'%')
mapper.delete: update politics_person set deleted = 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:

update politics_person
cn_name = #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
en_name = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mini_cn_name = #{miniCnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mini_en_name = #{miniEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country_id = #{countryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

partygroup_id = #{partygroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
